name: Microsoft Plus! for Windows XP
summary:
Microsoft Plus! for Windows XP is an add-on product for the Microsoft Windows XP operating system (OS) that includes additional desktop themes, screen savers, programs, and utilities. In addition to the functions of an OS, Microsoft Plus! for Windows XP contains 3 exclusive games which were not available for purchase by themselves:

- Hyperbowl Plus! Edition
- The Labyrinth Plus! Edition
- Russian Square Plus! Edition
